After more than four decades in the public eye, the rock star Bono has revealed a deeply personal secret and spoken of finding forgiveness and peace.

articles.title: Vaccinologist Sarah Gilbert: ‘We need to be better prepared for a new pandemic’ - The Guardian
articles.description: The woman who co-developed the AstraZeneca vaccine on reassuring doubters, her new book and having a baby penguin named after her
